title: Dispel Evil and Good
content:
Dispel Evil and Good Level 5 Abjuration Spell Abberations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you. You can also Break Enchantments that Charm, Frighten, or Possess allies. 10 turns Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Dispel Evil and Good

Level 5 Abjuration Spell

Abberations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

You can also Break Enchantments that Charm, Frighten, or Possess a
